metadata.description: Dataset for fine-tuning a trading bot to trade Solana AI tokens on Solana Blockchain.
metadata.use_case: Trading AI-powered Tokens on Solana Blockchain

feature_definitions.token_pair: The trading pair of the token (e.g., AI/USDC).
feature_definitions.timestamp: ISO 8601 format timestamp for the data point.
feature_definitions.price: Price of the token in the trading pair.
feature_definitions.sentiment_score: Aggregated sentiment score from social media and news sources (range: -1 to 1).
feature_definitions.on_chain_activity: Count of significant on-chain activities (e.g., token transfers, new wallets).
feature_definitions.social_mentions: Count of social media mentions during the period.
feature_definitions.signal: Trading signal generated based on the analysis (e.g., buy, sell, hold).
